title: Adolescence: a case study
brief_description: A study of adolescence as a time of change. Explores the life of Angie, a 17 year old high school student. Shows her at home, at school and with friends. Dr John Flavell talks about Piaget’s concept of “formal operations” and explains mental development in adolescence.
